languages.text: {n}Темные глаза сестры {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сороритас{/g} вспыхивают.{/n} "Мы должны спасти всех, кого сможем! Все это — не просто так. Святая Арджента, чье имя я ношу с благоговением и трепетом, известна тем, что силой молитвы спасла людей из гибнущего мира. Сам Император ниспослал с небес звезду, что вознесла святую и ее последователей ввысь, прочь от скверны и смерти. Нам надлежит поступить так же — направить все силы на спасение тех, кто сейчас глядит на небо с надеждой!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Темные глаза сестры {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сороритас{/g} вспыхивают.{/n} "Мы должны спасти всех, кого сможем! Все это — не просто так. Святая Арджента, чье имя я ношу с благоговением и трепетом, известна тем, что силой молитвы спасла людей из гибнущего мира. Сам Император ниспослал с небес звезду, что вознесла святую и ее последователей ввысь, прочь от скверны и смерти. Нам надлежит поступить также — направить все силы на спасение тех, что сейчас глядят на небо с надеждой!"

languages.text: {n}The dark eyes of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} flash.{/n} "We must save as many as we can! This has all happened for a reason. Saint Argenta, whose name I carry with reverence and trepidation, is famed for saving the people of a dying world through the power of prayer. The God-Emperor Himself sent a star from the heavens that lifted the saint and her followers up to the sky, away from corruption and death. We must do as she did — direct all our efforts to saving those people who at this moment look to the heavens in hope of salvation!"
languages.original_text: {n}Темные глаза сестры {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сороритас{/g} вспыхивают.{/n} "Мы должны спасти всех, кого сможем! Все это — не просто так. We must do as she did — direct all our efforts to saving those people who at this moment look to the heavens in hope of salvation!"

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}战斗修女{/g}的黑眼睛中闪过一道亮光。{/n}“我们必须尽可能多地拯救人们！这一切的一切，都是由于某种原因发生的。我怀着崇敬与惶恐的心情，继承了圣阿洁塔的名字。这位赫赫有名的圣人生前最擅长通过祈祷的力量，拯救那些身处濒临毁灭世界中的人们。她是神皇本人亲自从天上送来的希望之星。她会拯救她的追随者们，让他们远离腐化与死亡。我们必须追随圣阿洁塔的榜样，付出我们的全部力量，拯救那些此时此刻正在仰望天堂，渴望得到救赎的人们！”
languages.original_text: {n}The dark eyes of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} flash.{/n} "We must save as many as we can! This has all happened for a reason. Saint Argenta, whose name I carry with reverence and trepidation, is famed for saving the people of a dying world through the power of prayer. The God-Emperor Himself sent a star from the heavens that lifted the saint and her followers up to the sky, away from corruption and death. We must do as she did — direct all our efforts to saving those people who at this moment look to the heavens in hope of salvation!"

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}战斗修女{/g}的黑眼睛中闪过一道亮光。{/n}“我们必须尽可能多地拯救人们！这一切的一切，都是由于某种原因发生的。我怀着崇敬与惶恐的心情，继承了圣阿洁塔的名字。这位赫赫有名的圣人生前最擅长通过祈祷的力量，拯救那些身处濒临毁灭世界中的人们。她是神皇本人亲自从天上送来的希望之星。她会拯救她的追随者们，让他们远离腐化与死亡。我们必须追随圣阿洁塔的榜样，付出我们的全部力量，拯救那些此时此刻正在仰望天堂，渴望得到救赎的人们！”

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}バトルシスター{/g}の黒い瞳が閃いた。{/n}「できる限り多くの人を救わなければならぬ！これはすべて理由があって起こったことである。聖アルジェンタは、我が敬愛と畏怖の念を込めて名乗る、祈りの力によって滅びゆく世界の人々を救ったことで有名な人物だ。神帝陛下が自ら天より星を送り、聖人とその信者たちを腐敗と死から遠ざけ、天空に引き上げたのだ。我らも彼女のように、今この瞬間、救いを求めて天を仰ぐ人々を救うため、あらゆる努力を惜しんではならない！」
languages.original_text: {n}The dark eyes of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} flash.{/n} "We must save as many as we can! This has all happened for a reason. Saint Argenta, whose name I carry with reverence and trepidation, is famed for saving the people of a dying world through the power of prayer. The God-Emperor Himself sent a star from the heavens that lifted the saint and her followers up to the sky, away from corruption and death. We must do as she did — direct all our efforts to saving those people who at this moment look to the heavens in hope of salvation!"

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}シスター・オヴ・バトル{/g}の黒い瞳が閃いた。{/n}「できる限り多くの人を救わなければならぬ！これはすべて理由があって起こったことだ。聖アルジェンタは、私が敬愛と畏怖の念を込めて名乗る、祈りの力によって滅びゆく世界の人々を救ったことで有名な人物だ。神帝陛下が自ら天より星を送り、聖人とその信者たちを腐敗と死から遠ざけ、天空に引き上げたのだ。我らも彼女のように、今この瞬間、救いを求めて天を仰ぐ人々を救うため、あらゆる努力を惜しんではならない！」

{n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}バトルシスター{/g}の黒い瞳が閃いた。{/n}「できる限り多くの人を救わなければならぬ！これはすべて理由があって起こったことである。聖アルジェンタは、我が敬愛と畏怖の念を込めて名乗る、祈りの力によって滅びゆく世界の人々を救ったことで有名な人物だ。神帝陛下が自ら天より星を送り、聖人とその信者たちを腐敗と死から遠ざけ、天空に引き上げたのだ。我らも彼女のように、今この瞬間、救いを求めて天を仰ぐ人々を救うため、あらゆる努力を惜しんではならない！」

languages.text: {n}Die dunklen Augen der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Schwester der Schlacht{/g} blitzen auf.{/n} "Wir müssen so viele wie möglich retten! Das alles ist nicht ohne Grund geschehen. Die Heilige Argenta, deren Namen ich mit Ehrfurcht und auch Verzagtheit trage, ist dafür bekannt, Bewohner einer sterbenden Welt durch die Macht des Gebets zu retten. Der Gottimperator selbst entsandte einen Stern vom Himmel, der die Heilige und ihre Anhänger emporhob, weg von Korruption und Tod. Wir müssen genauso handeln und mit aller Anstrengung diese Menschen retten, die genau jetzt in der Hoffnung auf Erlösung flehentlich zum Himmel blicken!"
languages.original_text: {n}The dark eyes of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} flash.{/n} "We must save as many as we can! This has all happened for a reason. Saint Argenta, whose name I carry with reverence and trepidation, is famed for saving the people of a dying world through the power of prayer. The God-Emperor Himself sent a star from the heavens that lifted the saint and her followers up to the sky, away from corruption and death. We must do as she did — direct all our efforts to saving those people who at this moment look to the heavens in hope of salvation!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die dunklen Augen der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Schwester der Schlacht{/g} blitzen auf.{/n} "Wir müssen so viele wie möglich retten! Das alles ist nicht ohne Grund geschehen. Die Heilige Argenta, deren Namen ich mit Ehrfurcht und auch Verzagtheit trage, ist dafür bekannt, Bewohner einer sterbenden Welt durch die Macht des Gebets zu retten. Der Gottimperator selbst entsandte einen Stern vom Himmel, der die Heilige und ihre Anhänger emporhob, weg von Korruption und Tod. Wir müssen genauso handeln und mit aller Anstrengung diese Menschen retten, die genau jetzt in der Hoffnung auf Erlösung flehentlich zum Himmel blicken!"

languages.text: {n}Les yeux noirs de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sœur de Bataille{/g} s'illuminent.{/n} « Nous devons sauver le plus grand nombre de ces victimes ! Tout cela n'est pas arrivé par hasard. Sainte Argenta, dont je porte le nom avec crainte et dévotion, est célébrée pour avoir sauvé le peuple d'un monde par la force de sa prière. L'Empereur-Dieu lui-même fit descendre une étoile des cieux qui emporta la sainte et ses disciples loin des affres de la corruption et de la mort. Nous devons suivre ses pas, c'est-à-dire consacrer tous nos efforts à venir en aide aux malheureux qui, en ce moment même, lèvent les yeux au ciel dans l'espoir d'être secourus ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The dark eyes of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} flash.{/n} "We must save as many as we can! This has all happened for a reason. Saint Argenta, whose name I carry with reverence and trepidation, is famed for saving the people of a dying world through the power of prayer. The God-Emperor Himself sent a star from the heavens that lifted the saint and her followers up to the sky, away from corruption and death. We must do as she did — direct all our efforts to saving those people who at this moment look to the heavens in hope of salvation!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux noirs de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sœur de Bataille{/g} s'illuminent.{/n} « Nous devons sauver le plus grand nombre de ces victimes ! Tout cela n'est pas arrivé par hasard. Sainte Argenta, dont je porte le nom avec crainte et dévotion, est célébrée pour avoir sauvé le peuple d'un monde par la force de sa prière. L'Empereur-Dieu lui-même fit descendre une étoile des cieux qui emporta la sainte et ses disciples loin des affres de la corruption de et de la mort. Nous devons suivre ses pas, c'est-à-dire consacrer tous nos efforts à venir en aide aux malheureux qui, en ce moment même, lèvent les yeux au ciel dans l'espoir d'être secourus ! »

languages.text: {n}Los ojos negros de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Hermana de Batalla{/g} brillan.{/n} «¡Debemos salvar a tantos como podamos! Todo esto ha ocurrido por un motivo. Santa Argenta, cuyo nombre llevo con veneración y turbación, es conocida por salvar a la gente de un mundo moribundo con el poder de la oración. El mismísimo Dios Emperador envió una estrella que elevó a la santa y a sus seguidores a los cielos, lejos de la corrupción y la muerte. ¡Debemos seguir su ejemplo y dedicar todos nuestros esfuerzos a salvar a la gente que alza la mirada en busca de un milagro!».
languages.original_text: {n}The dark eyes of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} flash.{/n} "We must save as many as we can! This has all happened for a reason. Saint Argenta, whose name I carry with reverence and trepidation, is famed for saving the people of a dying world through the power of prayer. The God-Emperor Himself sent a star from the heavens that lifted the saint and her followers up to the sky, away from corruption and death. We must do as she did — direct all our efforts to saving those people who at this moment look to the heavens in hope of salvation!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos negros de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Hermana de Batalla{/g} brillan.{/n} «¡Debemos salvar a tantos como podamos! Todo esto ha ocurrido por un motivo. Santa Argenta, cuyo nombre llevo con veneración y turbación, es conocida por salvar a la gente de un mundo moribundo con el poder de la oración. El mismísimo Dios Emperador envió una estrella que elevó a la santa y a sus seguidores a los cielos, lejos de la corrupción y la muerte. ¡Debemos seguir su ejemplo y dedicar todos nuestros esfuerzos a salvar a la gente que alza la mirada en busca de un milagro!».

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Harp Rahibesi'nin{/g} kara gözleri parlıyor.{/n} "Kurtarabildiğimiz kadarını kurtarmalıyız! Bütün bu olanlar sebepsiz değil. Adını hürmet ve huşuyla taşıdığım Azize Argenta, ölmekte olan bir dünyadaki insanları dualarının gücüyle kurtarmasıyla ünlüdür. Tanrı İmparator Hazretleri, semadan bir yıldız göndererek azizi ve takipçilerini yozlaşma ve ölümden uzaklaştırıp göğe çıkarmıştı. Biz de onun gibi yapmalı, tüm çabalarımızı şu an reha umuduyla gökyüzüne bakan insanları kurtarmaya odaklamalıyız!"
languages.original_text: {n}The dark eyes of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} flash.{/n} "We must save as many as we can! This has all happened for a reason. Saint Argenta, whose name I carry with reverence and trepidation, is famed for saving the people of a dying world through the power of prayer. The God-Emperor Himself sent a star from the heavens that lifted the saint and her followers up to the sky, away from corruption and death. We must do as she did — direct all our efforts to saving those people who at this moment look to the heavens in hope of salvation!"

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Harp Rahibesi{/g}'nin kara gözleri parlıyor.{/n} "Kurtarabildiğimiz kadarını kurtarmalıyız! Olanların bir sebebi var. Adını hürmet ve heyecanla taşıdığım Azize Argenta, ölmekte olan bir dünyadaki insanları iman gücüyle kurtarmasıyla ünlüdür. Tanrı İmparator'un bizzat kendisi, cennetinden bir yıldız göndererek azizi ve takipçilerini yozlaşma ve ölümden uzaklaştırıp göğe çıkarmıştı. Biz de onun gibi yapmalı; tüm çabalarımızı, şu anda kurtuluş umuduyla cennete bakan insanları kurtarmaya odaklamalıyız!"
